response.overview: This film stars Japanese actress Shuhualin, a famous Japanese actress who has starred in multiple classic works. Due to her charming appearance, she often plays the roles of Loli and others. In addition, she is also a heavy taste actress who has held tight photography events and has a great love for bundling and SM. This film is also a bundling type film that she starred in. This film tells the story of Shuhualin playing the role of a president's wife. The president is a mercenary and unforgivable businessman. Once, a factory worker begged the president to purchase the products produced by their factory, but the president did not take him seriously. After the factory closed down, the heartbroken worker decided to fight against the president to the end. He broke into the president's house, raped the president's wife, and tied her up. After the president returned home, Kidnapped the president again and sexually assaulted and insulted his wife in front of him
response.title: Bad.Man - Wife's.Butt
